name: Magnamus
description:
Note about browser version

This is my first time making a game working on HTML5, so if the web build doesn't work or is way too laggy, please try downloading the desktop build. I will try to resolve the issue as fast as I can. Thank you very much and sorry for the trouble!

Play as a mage, exploring the world that is completely uncharted. 

Invade the hostile environment and restore your powers. 

Magnamus is a short prototype of a metroidvania, made for Metroidvania Month 19.

Controls

Game was largely made with mouse in mind.

Movement - WSAD

Magic - LMB, RMB and E

Pause - ESC

Credits

Main character sprite - https://penzilla.itch.io/hooded-protagonist

Waterfall sounds - https://opengameart.org/content/stream-sounds

Crystal sounds - https://opengameart.org/content/rockmetal-slide

Slime sounds - https://opengameart.org/content/slime-noises

Special thanks to DinoBrando for playtesting.

Known bugs

There are certain issues with save system that I am aware of, and couldn't do much with them on time ): But I will try to fix them as fast as I can.
